summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Token Mentions API and TokenMentionsTable component. Backend endpoint /api/telegram-intel/channel/:username/mentions working correctly with all query parameters. Frontend TokenMentionsTable renders correctly with data and empty states.
passed_tests: ✅ GET /api/telegram-intel/channel/:username/mentions returns correct structure (ok, total, evaluated, topTokens, mentions)
✅ Response includes avgReturn7d and hitRate summary stats
✅ topTokens array contains mentionCount, evaluatedCount, avgReturn7d, avgMax7d per token
✅ mentions array contains token, mentionedAt, messageId, context, evaluated, priceAtMention, returns
✅ Empty response for channels without mentions (durov, test_channel)
✅ days query parameter filters by time window
✅ limit query parameter limits response size
✅ evaluated=true filter returns only evaluated mentions
✅ Channel search loads token mentions data correctly
✅ Table shows token badges with return percentages
✅ Sort headers functional (token, date, r7d, max7d)
✅ Empty state displays correctly with message 'No Token Mentions'
seed_data_creation: Used existing test channels: alpha_channel, beta_channel, gamma_channel, delta_channel
context_for_next_testing_agent: Token mentions endpoint fully tested. Test file at /app/backend/tests/test_token_mentions_api.py can be reused for regression testing. Channels with mentions: alpha_channel, beta_channel. Channels without mentions: durov, test_channel.
